casebody.data:
HARRIS
v.
N.C. DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY 110A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 22, 2017 Tamika L. Henderson, Assistant Attorney Geneal, for N.C. Department of Public Safety. Michael C. Byrne, Attorney at Law, for Harris, Steven.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 20th of June 2017 by Petitioner:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of June 2017."

Petitioner shall have up to and including the 10th day of August 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
